subject: p13078497
History: Evaluation of the patient with ventilation-acquired pneumonia, intubated.
Findings: AP radiograph of the chest was reviewed in comparison to. The position of the ET tube, right PICC line, and the NG tube are unchanged. Extensive parenchymal consolidations appear to be minimally improved since the prior study. Cardiomediastinal silhouette is unchanged.
